mapper.sql: self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID, self.RECONCILIATION_ID, self.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, self.ORDER_NUMBER, self.TRANSPORT_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, self.TRANSPORT_ORDER_NUMBER, self.SEND_CITY_ID, self.RECV_CITY_ID, self.DISTANCE, self.PRODUCTION_NUMBER, self.CAR_BRAND_ID, self.CAR_TYPE_ID, self.CAR_MODEL_ID, self.CAR_VIN, self.CUSTOMER_ID, self.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, self.DESIGNATED_LOADING_DATE, self.ACTUAL_LOADING_DATE, self.QUOTATION_ID, self.QUOTATION_PRICE, self.HEDGE_AMOUNT, self.SETTLEMENT_PRICE, self.DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, self.DEDUCTION_REASON, self.RECV_UNIT_ID, self.SEND_UNIT_ID, self.CORP_ID, self.FLAG, cityA.CITY_NAME as refSendCityName, cityB.CITY_NAME as refRecvCityName, unitA.UNIT_NAME as refSendUnitName, unitB.UNIT_NAME as refRecvUnitName, corpA.CORP_NAME as refCorpName, corpB.CORP_NAME as refCustomerName, carBrand.BRAND_NAME as refCarBrandName, carType.CAR_TYPE_NAME as refCarTypeName, carModel.CAR_NAME as refCarModelName, quotation.QUOTATION_TYPE as refQuotationType, customerInfo.DEALER_NUMBER as refDealerNumber

where self.DEL = 0 and self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId} and self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId} and self.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId} and self.ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber} and self.TRANSPORT_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{transportOrderDetailId} and self.TRANSPORT_ORDER_NUMBER = #{transportOrderNumber} and self.SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId} and self.RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId} and self.DISTANCE = #{distance} and self.PRODUCTION_NUMBER = #{productionNumber} and self.CAR_BRAND_ID = #{carBrandId} and self.CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId} and self.CAR_MODEL_ID = #{carModelId} and self.CAR_VIN = #{carVin} and self.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} and self.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = #{customerCorpId} and self.DESIGNATED_LOADING_DATE = #{designatedLoadingDate} and self.ACTUAL_LOADING_DATE = #{actualLoadingDate} and self.QUOTATION_ID = #{quotationId} and self.QUOTATION_PRICE = #{quotationPrice} and self.HEDGE_AMOUNT = #{hedgeAmount} and self.SETTLEMENT_PRICE = #{settlementPrice} and self.DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount} and self.DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason} and self.RECV_UNIT_ID = #{recvUnitId} and self.SEND_UNIT_ID = #{sendUnitId} and self.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and self.FLAG = #{flag}
mapper.select: select from fs_customer_reconciliation_detail self left join bd_city cityA on self.SEND_CITY_ID = cityA.CITY_ID left join bd_city cityB on self.RECV_CITY_ID = cityB.CITY_ID left join bd_unit unitA on self.SEND_UNIT_ID = unitA.UNIT_ID left join bd_unit unitB on self.RECV_UNIT_ID = unitB.UNIT_ID left join sys_corp corpA on self.CORP_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_brand carBrand on self.CAR_BRAND_ID = carBrand.BRAND_ID left join bd_car_type carType on self.CAR_TYPE_ID = carType.CAR_TYPE_ID left join bd_car carModel on self.CAR_MODEL_ID = carModel.CAR_ID left join fs_quotation quotation on self.QUOTATION_ID = quotation.QUOTATION_ID left join bd_customer_info customerInfo on self.CUSTOMER_ID = customerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID where self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and self.DEL = 0
mapper.insert: insert into fs_customer_reconciliation_detail (RECONCILIATION_ID, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, TRANSPORT_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, TRANSPORT_ORDER_NUMBER, SEND_CITY_ID, RECV_CITY_ID, DISTANCE, PRODUCTION_NUMBER, CAR_BRAND_ID, CAR_TYPE_ID, CAR_MODEL_ID, CAR_VIN, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, DESIGNATED_LOADING_DATE, ACTUAL_LOADING_DATE, QUOTAITON_ID, QUOTATION_PRICE, HEDGE_AMOUNT, SETTLEMENT_PRICE, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, DEDUCTION_REASON, RECV_UNIT_ID, SEND_UNIT_ID, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transportOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{distance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{productionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{designatedLoadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualLoadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{quotationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quotationPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hedgeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settlementPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recvUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into fs_customer_reconciliation_detail RECONCILIATION_ID, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, TRANSPORT_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, TRANSPORT_ORDER_NUMBER, SEND_CITY_ID, RECV_CITY_ID, DISTANCE, PRODUCTION_NUMBER, CAR_BRAND_ID, CAR_TYPE_ID, CAR_MODEL_ID, CAR_VIN, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, DESIGNATED_LOADING_DATE, ACTUAL_LOADING_DATE, QUOTATION_ID, QUOTATION_PRICE, HEDGE_AMOUNT, SETTLEMENT_PRICE, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, DEDUCTION_REASON, RECV_UNIT_ID, SEND_UNIT_ID, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transportOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{distance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{productionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{designatedLoadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualLoadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{quotationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quotationPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hedgeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settlementPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recvUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update fs_customer_reconciliation_detail RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{transportOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRANSPORT_ORDER_NUMBER = #{transportOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DISTANCE = #{distance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PRODUCTION_NUMBER = #{productionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_BRAND_ID = #{carBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_MODEL_ID = #{carModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DESIGNATED_LOADING_DATE = #{designatedLoadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTUAL_LOADING_DATE = #{actualLoadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUOTATION_ID = #{quotationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, QUOTATION_PRICE = #{quotationPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HEDGE_AMOUNT = #{hedgeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLEMENT_PRICE = #{settlementPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECV_UNIT_ID = #{recvUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SEND_UNIT_ID = #{sendUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fs_customer_reconciliation_detail set RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{transportOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRANSPORT_ORDER_NUMBER = #{transportOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DISTANCE = #{distance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PRODUCTION_NUMBER = #{productionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_BRAND_ID = #{carBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_MODEL_ID = #{carModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DESIGNATED_LOADING_DATE = #{designatedLoadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTUAL_LOADING_DATE = #{actualLoadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUOTATION_ID = #{quotationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, QUOTATION_PRICE = #{quotationPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HEDGE_AMOUNT = #{hedgeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLEMENT_PRICE = #{settlementPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECV_UNIT_ID = #{recvUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SEND_UNIT_ID = #{sendUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from fs_customer_reconciliation_detail self left join bd_city cityA on self.SEND_CITY_ID = cityA.CITY_ID left join bd_city cityB on self.RECV_CITY_ID = cityB.CITY_ID left join bd_unit unitA on self.SEND_UNIT_ID = unitA.UNIT_ID left join bd_unit unitB on self.RECV_UNIT_ID = unitB.UNIT_ID left join sys_corp corpA on self.CORP_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_brand carBrand on self.CAR_BRAND_ID = carBrand.BRAND_ID left join bd_car_type carType on self.CAR_TYPE_ID = carType.CAR_TYPE_ID left join bd_car carModel on self.CAR_MODEL_ID = carModel.CAR_ID left join fs_quotation quotation on self.QUOTATION_ID = quotation.QUOTATION_ID left join bd_customer_info customerInfo on self.CUSTOMER_ID = customerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID order by ${orderByClause}

select from fs_customer_reconciliation_detail self left join bd_city cityA on self.SEND_CITY_ID = cityA.CITY_ID left join bd_city cityB on self.RECV_CITY_ID = cityB.CITY_ID left join bd_unit unitA on self.SEND_UNIT_ID = unitA.UNIT_ID left join bd_unit unitB on self.RECV_UNIT_ID = unitB.UNIT_ID left join sys_corp corpA on self.CORP_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_brand carBrand on self.CAR_BRAND_ID = carBrand.BRAND_ID left join bd_car_type carType on self.CAR_TYPE_ID = carType.CAR_TYPE_ID left join bd_car carModel on self.CAR_MODEL_ID = carModel.CAR_ID left join fs_quotation quotation on self.QUOTATION_ID = quotation.QUOTATION_ID left join bd_customer_info customerInfo on self.CUSTOMER_ID = customerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID where self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId} and self.CAR_VIN = #{carVin} and self.DESIGNATED_LOADING_DATE = #{designatedLoadingDate} and self.SEND_UNIT_ID = #{sendUnitId} and self.RECV_UNIT_ID = #{recvUnitId} and self.FLAG = 0 and self.DEL = 0

select from fs_customer_reconciliation_detail self left join bd_city cityA on self.SEND_CITY_ID = cityA.CITY_ID left join bd_city cityB on self.RECV_CITY_ID = cityB.CITY_ID left join bd_unit unitA on self.SEND_UNIT_ID = unitA.UNIT_ID left join bd_unit unitB on self.RECV_UNIT_ID = unitB.UNIT_ID left join sys_corp corpA on self.CORP_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_brand carBrand on self.CAR_BRAND_ID = carBrand.BRAND_ID left join bd_car_type carType on self.CAR_TYPE_ID = carType.CAR_TYPE_ID left join bd_car carModel on self.CAR_MODEL_ID = carModel.CAR_ID left join fs_quotation quotation on self.QUOTATION_ID = quotation.QUOTATION_ID left join bd_customer_info customerInfo on self.CUSTOMER_ID = customerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID where self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId} and self.DEL = 0
mapper.update: update fs_customer_reconciliation_detail self set self.DEL = 1 where self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId}
mapper.select: select distinct self.CAR_VIN from fs_customer_reconciliation_detail self where self.DEL = 0 and self.FLAG = 0
